post.body: et al yes...TasteSpotting is having a temper tantrum right now. we are trying to find a nice Cabernet to calm it down...
no watermarks please! thank you!
yes! though faster turnaround overall takes away exposure time (and thereby, clickthru traffic) for each submission...
try now! should be working...
was down this morning, but hello again! looking forward to seeing your holiday recipes...
server was okay - it was a load problem - holiday rush starting up again :) we asked santa for more bandwidth ;)
thanks for the post! http://tinyurl.com/5cfkx3
we're always happy to give you a more detailed explanation...just drop us a direct line!
we're here! just needed a jumpstart this morning.
aw that you were tweeting - hopefully everything is all good on TasteSpotting for you. we love yours: http://is.gd/ceZA
we got your pic - it made it in through a sliver... :)
TRUST US, we can't live without YOUR daily dose of TasteSpotting either ;)
if you wouldn't mind that would beappreciated! basically anything done on TS from 5 am yesterday to about 12 pm today is gone
we're bAAAAAaaaaack.
well, for the moment, how about throwing pictures-only here: http://www.flickr.com/groups/tastespotting/
we're now thinking more along the lines of the most opposite of Thanksgiving turkey for us: http://www.tastespotting.com/search/sushi/1
turkey benedict, you think?
Happy Thanksgiving! Looking forward to seeing all your turkey omelets, turkey nachos, turkey chili, turkey tetrazzini, turkey pot pie...:)
wait - why do we already have LEFTOVERS?!?! thanksgiving it TOMORROW!
today, we're baking desserts for tomorrow: http://tinyurl.com/5vl3fg
two days before the big race: make cranberry sauce now: http://www.tastespotting.com/search/cranberry/1
ok, so retweeting ourselves ~ obvious descriptions + tags/keywords + if it's a fine piece of holiday taste, please add tag HOLIDAYS :)
just a gentle reminder to 1) BE OBVIOUS in your descriptions of what you're submitting and 2) ENTER KEYWORDS/TAGS thx!
because you refuse to make THE green bean casserole: http://tinyurl.com/59qzyw
mashed potatoes. WITH sour cream. AND cream cheese. whoaMG http://tinyurl.com/5nksye
thanksgiving recipes pouring in now...www.tastespotting.com
may have to go back up to SF just so we can try the Ex Boyfriend Sandwich: http://tinyurl.com/6bbz85
ok. everything is working. yay! happy hour anyone?
yep - we were down for a bit this morning - it was a long weekend...needed a little more coffee to get started :)
for those who didn't get via @TheDelicious: http://www.typealyzer.com for your BLOG's myers-briggs personality type! (TasteSpotting is ESFP)
just love love love loving all the holiday cookies that are being served up....maybe december will from now on be CookieSpotting
again, wanna say thanks to all for your patience over the last two days. it's been, well, a doozy, to say the least! good things to come...
if you made a submission to TS yesterday 12/16/08, you might need to re-upload because some of the images, unforch, were left behind...
we should be....GOOD TO GO
and in the mean time, PLEASE visit CHEZ PIM and participate in the MENU FOR HOPE! http://tinyurl.com/5re746
a little slow, but it IS coming up...you guys are the best for having patience with us
ok, we should be up (not sure if the uploading is working yet) - let us know if you can't see us.
bear with us for a little while longer - we're almost done moving everything to a bigger, better house :)
yes, the host moved our sites to a different server, which is causing all kinds of problems right now. should be back up to speed shortly
